Draft Rating:

B-

Larry Harris ranks in the 63th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Harris's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted David Noel with 39th pick but was worth 24th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Andrew Bogut with 1th pick but was worth 6th pick.
  • Drafted Yi Jianlian with 6th pick but was worth 40th pick.
  • Drafted Ramon Sessions with 56th pick but was worth 33th pick.

Their biggest L:
